message: Let's split the money reasonably. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Your offer was a bit too greedy for me. Let's be fair - I'll take a slight advantage this round, and we can avoid losing money to inflation.
Bob, let's be realistic.  You're losing value every round. My turn to propose a slight advantage for me, and we can wrap this up.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  We both lose if this drags on. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
